thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
Flighthub is a great site with great prices. The only thing I wish they would change is that the extra insurance options are not automatically added on. You should need to select what you want and not have it automatically selected for you as it can be quite a substantial additional cost. This happened to me once and I didn't notice it getting added on and had to fight to have it removed. It was not a pleasant experience.
Other than that everything is great!!
